Disclaimer.definition: a refusal or disavowal of something that one has a right to claim ;specif
Disclaimer.origin: [Anglo-French desclamer , from desclamer to disavow, deny, from Old French des -, prefix marking reversal + clamer to claim see claim ]

1.definition: a refusal or disavowal of something that one has a right to claima relinquishment or formal refusal to accept an interest or estate see also

2.definition: a denial of responsibility for a thing or act

sub_terms.a: a negation or limitation of the rights under a warranty given by a seller to a buyer
sub_terms.b: a denial of coverage by an insurance company

3.definition: a writing that embodies a disclaimer
